snippet.title: Wizard's Legacy | Official Early Access Trailer
snippet.description:
🎮 Wishlist Now on Steam! 
https://store.steampowered.com/app/2817600?utm_source=youtube?utm_content=trailer

Are you ready to feel the magic at the tip of your fingers, and go on an unforgettable adventure in a fantastical world? Take a look at Wizard's Legacy and experience magic on Steam VR and Meta App Lab on August 8th, 2024 🪄.

Wizard's Legacy invites you to become a powerful wizard, uncover ancient secrets, and master arcane powers in a VR environment. Will you rise to the challenge? 

♾ Coming soon on Meta Quest!

👾 Be a part of this magical community:
https://discord.gg/VewwMRF6PA

Follow us for the latest updates:

📷 Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/widegamestudio/
❌ Twitter: https://x.com/WideGameStudio
🔥Tiktok: https://www.tiktok.com/@wizards.legacy
🕸 Website: https://widegamestudio.com/
